package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: Notification Daemon
package-manager.description: The Desktop Notifications framework provides a standard way of doing passive pop-up notifications on the Linux desktop. These are designed to notify the user of something without interrupting their work with a dialog box that they must close. Passive popups can automatically disappear after a short period of time. as per the Desktop Notifications spec
